velocity.description:
Velocity value for projectile, check individual projectile stats for values.
Affects maximum range of the projectile, can also cause units to miss some their shots, use with care!

arch_type.description:
Arch type for the projectile, 0 is used by most units, 1 is used by trebuchets and mangonels, 2 is used by catapults by default
Warning: changing arch type can cause your units to miss most of their shots, and sometimes even make them unable to shoot at all!

cost.description: In order: Wood, Stone, Iron, Pitch, Gold

baseDelivery.description: How many of the good is delivered at once. Disallowed for Flour!

skirmishBonus.description: In skirmish mode, almost all production is boosted by 50%, this can be toggled here.

thresholds.description:
Thresholds for unlocking each coverage level of religion
Vanilla is [24, 50, 75, 93] (even though ingame visuals show otherwise)

bonuses.description:
Popularity bonus for each coverage level of religion
Vanilla is [50, 100, 150, 200]

multipliers.description:
Alternative to "bonuses", makes it so that every percentage of coverage is counted towards popularity, calculation is made in percentage*value
[2, 2, 2, 2] would be equivalent of Vanilla.

cathedral_bonus.description:
Popularity bonus for building cathedral.
Vanilla is 50

church_bonus.description:
Popularity bonus for building church.
Vanilla is 25

popularity_per_good_level.description: Popularity effect per level of good things, vanilla is 25

popularity_per_bad_level.description: Popularity effect per level of bad things, vanilla is 25

productivity.description:
Productivity bonuses, from -5 fear factor to +5 fear factor
Vanilla is [150, 140, 130, 120, 110, 100, 90, 80, 70, 60, 50]

combat_bonus.description:
Combat bonus percentages, from -5 fear factor to +5 fear factor
Vanilla is [75, 80, 85, 90, 95, 100, 105, 110, 115, 120, 125]

coverage.description: 2^X people per fear factor building requirement to increase. Example: 4 means 2^4=16 means by 16 population, player would require one additional fear factor building per level. Vanilla is 4

resting_factor.description: Multiplier for how much walking to gardens is counted towards the required, vanilla is 1. Making this value bigger would mean less walking between good things under positive fear factor

popularity.description:
Popularity effects per taxation level
Vanilla is [175, 125, 75, 25, -50, -100, -150, -200, -300, -400]

gold.description:
List of taxation values. All taxation values must be a positive multiples of 0.01. Must contain one entry with exact value of \"0.00\", which determines the neutral tax level. 
 Values to the left of 0.00 will be considered bribes. Vanilla is [1, 0.8, 0.6, 0.0, 0.6, 0.8, 1.0, 1.2, 1.4, 1.6, 1.8, 2]

thresholds.description:
Thresholds for unlocking each coverage level of beer
Vanilla is [25, 50, 75, 100]

bonuses.description:
Popularity bonus for each coverage level of beer
Vanilla is [50, 100, 150, 200]

multipliers.description:
Alternative to "bonuses", makes it so that every percentage of coverage is counted towards popularity, calculation is made in percentage*value
[2, 2, 2, 2] would be equivalent of Vanilla.

coverage_per_inn.description:
People covered per active Inn
Vanilla is 30

flagons_per_beer.description: How many flagons are supplied from 1 unit of beer, vanilla is 160

ration_bonuses.description:
Popularity effect for: No Food / Half Rations / Extra Rations / Double Rations
Vanilla is [-200, -100, 100, 200]

variety_bonuses.description:
Popularity bonus for multiple food types: 2/3/4 in order.
Vanilla is [25, 50, 75]

food_value.description:
Amount of food value provided by 1 food unit. Making this number bigger would mean people need less food, and vice versa.
Vanilla is 15000

ballistaBoltDamage.description: Incoming damage from ballista bolts. (2/3 of this value is fire ballista bolt damage.)

baseMeleeDamage.description: Outgoing melee damage against every unit, unless otherwise specified in MeleeDamageVs section.

speedLevel.description: How fast the unit moves, smaller value means higher speed.

fortificationDamagePenalty.description:
Melee damage towards towers, is represented as penalty on buildingDamage
Can be written as either a negative or normal number, it will be interpreted as negative either way.

fortificationDamage.description: Melee damage towards sturdy buildings.(which is only towers in vanilla) Overrides fortificationDamagePenalty!

wallDamage.description: Melee damage towards walls and gatehouses.

powerLevel.description:
Represantative number for unit strength, relevant for various triggers(like dog cages) Vanilla values are as follows:
 European archer: 5
European crossbowman: 10
European spearman: 4
European pikeman: 10
European maceman: 10
European swordsman: 30
European knight: 35
Ladderman: 1
Engineer: 5
Monk: 8
Tunneler: 5
Arabian archer: 8
Arabian slave: 1
Arabian slinger: 2
Arabian assassin: 14
Arabian horse archer: 15
Arabian swordsman: 20
Arabian firethrower: 16
Fire ballista: 25
Catapult: 25

meleeEngage.description: Whether the unit engages in melee combat or not.

isBlessable.description: Whether the unit is considered as a unit to be blessed by priest (mostly relevant for workers).

allowedOnWalls.description: Whether the unit is allowed to go on top of walls.

jesterUnfriendly.description: Whether the unit does not want jester to visit him.

enable_half_siege_ammo.description: Whether to enable half siege ammo mode, where cats&trebs start with 10 rocks each and replenish 10 rocks for 10 stone.

catapultRockCollateralDamage.description: Splash damage of catapult rocks on buildings and walls, also applies to primary target

trebuchetRockCollateralPenalty.description: Splash damage of trebuchet rocks, written as negative value (compared to primary damage).

defaultMangonelPebbleUnitDamage.description: Default damage of mangonel pebbles towards every unit except the Lord and siege equipment, vanilla is 30000

defaultCatapultRockUnitDamage.description: Default damage of catapult rocks towards every unit except the Lord, vanilla is 30000

defaultTrebuchetRockUnitDamage.description: Default damage of trebuchet rocks towards every unit except the Lord, vanilla is 30000

defaultBallistaBoltUnitDamage.description: Default damage of ballista bolts towards every unit except the Lord and siege equipment, vanilla is 10000

siegeProjectileOneShotThreshold.description: Threshold for a siege projectile damage to insta-kill a unit, vanilla is 20000

ditch_per_pitch.description:
How many tiles of pitch ditch can be placed using 1 pitch in stockpile (Vanilla is 4)
Can only be a value from 1 to 4

killing_pit_damage.description: How much damage a killing pit does (Vanilla is 18000)

dog_trigger_threshold.description:
Total enemy unit strength nearby a dogcage for it to release the dogs, use this in combination with powerLevel attribute of units. 
Vanilla is 25.

fire_damage.description: Common fire damage for all units (Vanilla is 100)

arabbow_range.description: Range for Arabian Archers, default is 54

horse_archer_range.description: Range for Horse Archers, default is 54

fbal_range.description: Range for Fire Ballistas, default is 54

towerbal_range.description: Range for Tower Ballistas, default is 85

arrow.description:
Projectile properties for Arrows
Default is 125 velocity, Arch type of 0

catapult_rock.description:
Projectile properties for Catapult Rocks
Default is 10 velocity, Arch type of 2

trebuchet_rock.description:
Projectile properties for Trebuchet Rocks
Default is 30 velocity, Arch type of 1

mangonel_pebble.description:
Projectile properties for Mangonel Pebbles
Default is 15 velocity, Arch type of 1

crossbow_bolt.description:
Projectile properties for Crossbow Bolts
Default is 125 velocity, Arch type of 0

towerbal_bolt.description:
Projectile properties for Tower Ballista Bolts
Default is 170 velocity, Arch type of 0

slinger_stone.description:
Projectile properties for Slinger Stones
Default is 100 velocity, Arch type of 0

firethrower_grenade.description:
Projectile properties for Firethrower Grenades
Default is 80 velocity, Arch type of 0

firebal_bolt.description:
Projectile properties for Fire Ballista Bolts
Default is 125 velocity, Arch type of 0

enable_iron_double_pickup.description: Whether to enable double iron pickup mode, where iron worker waits and collects 2 ingots at once from iron mine. Note that this does not affect iron delivery amount by itself!

disable_rally_runners.description: Makes Arabian Archers, Slingers, Assassins and Firethrowers walk to their rally point instead of running.

leather_per_cow.description:
How many leather armor deliveries can be made from one cow.
Vanilla is 3

enable_ascension.description:
Whether to enable Ascension Mod-specific changes (only works on Extreme!).
Applies the following changes:
Units look bigger on minimap
Spearmen sprint when near enemies
Highground damage reduction from 66% to 50%.
Flagon cap on Inns reduced to 400.
Units check for nearby enemies more often.

enable_ai_ascension.description:
Whether to enable AI-Ascension Mod specific changes (only works on Extreme!)
Applies same changes as enable_ascension, except units' enemy check-rate increase.

population_gathering_rate.description: Population gathering rates, Calculation is as follows: 2000/(value*game speed)

Skirmish.description:
Population gathering rate values for skirmish&multiplayer matches
 Can be defined as either a map of thresholds-gathering rates or an 21 item array.

Scenario_lt_100.description:
Population gathering rate values for single player scenarios, where population is less than 100
 Can be defined as either a map of thresholds-gathering rates or an 21 item array.

Scenario_gt_100.description:
Population gathering rate values for single player scenarios, where population is more than 100
 Can be defined as either a map of thresholds-gathering rates or an 21 item array.

population_upkeep.description: Special upkeep system for skirmish&multiplayer matches. When defined, poeple gather slower, and leave faster as population grows.

slower_gathering.description: Penalty factor for gathering rate, select any number from 1 to 5. 5 is most severe.

minimum_gathering.description: Minimum value after gathering rate penalty is applied, defaults to 4.

faster_leaving.description: Boost factor for leaving rate, select any number from 1 to 5. 5 is most severe.
